sentences.sContent: That sums up the concept of authenticity.
sentences.sContent_eng: That sums up the concept of authenticity.
sentences.sCn: 这句话概括了真实性的概念。

sentences.sContent: You don't mind if I check its authenticity?
sentences.sContent_eng: You don't mind if I check its authenticity?
sentences.sCn: 你不介意我来验证它的真实性吧？

sentences.sContent: Is your life lacking purpose, authenticity and balance?
sentences.sContent_eng: Is your life lacking purpose, authenticity and balance?
sentences.sCn: 你的生活是否缺乏目标、真实性与平衡？

synos.tran: 真实性，[法]确实性；可靠性

remMethod.val: 拼写形似athen(s) city 雅典城

trans.tranOther: the quality of being real or true
